title: Beyond the shadows
creator_credit: Stan Phillips and Western Cine Productions
brief_description: The problems of mental retardation. How, through self-initiated effort, the people of Colorado Springs took steps to overcome their fears and prejudices against the mentally retarded and united in a programme to help provide health, welfare, educational and evaluation services to the handicapped.
